metadata.title: O-Linked Oligosaccharides Are Acquired by Herpes Simplex Virus Glycoproteins in the Golgi Apparatus

abstract.original_text: The O-linked oligosaccharides on mature forms of herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSVl) glycoproteins were characterized, and were found to account largely for the lower electrophoretic mobilities of these forms relative to the mobilities of immature forms.

sentences.segment_text: The O-linked oligosaccharides on mature forms of herpes simplex virus type 1 ( HSVl ) glycoproteins were characterized ,
and were found to account largely for the lower electrophoretic mobilities of these forms relative to the mobilities of immature forms .

abstract.original_text: Other posttranslational modifications of HSVl glycoproteins (designated gB, gC, gD and gE) were related temporally to the discrete shifts in electrophoretic mobilities that signal acquisition of the O-linked oligosaccharides.

sentences.segment_text: Other posttranslational modifications of HSVl glycoproteins ( designated gB , gC , gD and gE ) were related temporally to the discrete shifts in electrophoretic mobilities that signal acquisition of the O-linked oligosaccharides .

abstract.original_text: Fatty acid acylation (principally of gE) could be detected just prior to the shifts, whereas conversion of high-mannosetype N-linked oligosaccharides to the complex type occurred coincident with the shifts. The addition of O-linked oligosaccharides did not occur in cells treated with the ionophore monensin or in a ricinresistant cell line defective in the processing of Nlinked oligosaccharides.

sentences.segment_text: Fatty acid acylation ( principally of gE ) could be detected just prior to the shifts ,
whereas conversion of high-mannosetype N-linked oligosaccharides to the complex type occurred coincident with the shifts .
The addition of O-linked oligosaccharides did not occur in cells treated with the ionophore monensin or in a ricinresistant cell line defective in the processing of Nlinked oligosaccharides .

abstract.original_text: We conclude that extension of O-linked oligosaccharide chains on HSVI glycoproteins, and probably also attachment of the first O-linked sugars, occurs as a late posttranslational modification in the Golgi apparatus.

sentences.segment_text: We conclude that extension of O-linked oligosaccharide chains on HSVI glycoproteins ,
and probably also attachment of the first O-linked sugars ,
occurs as a late posttranslational modification in the Golgi apparatus .
